article_title: Sacramento’s economy rebounds, but many workers struggle
article_text: Unemployment is down, and Sacramento’s recovery is in full swing. But many Sacramentans are still coping with low wages and part-time work. “Most people don’t feel very secure, nor should they,” one labor expert said.

article_metadata.news-keywords: Sacramento, economy, state government, real estate, housing, development, health care, Affordable Care Act, Obamacare, layoffs, recession, recovery

article_summary:
Unemployment is down, and Sacramento’s recovery is in full swing.
But many Sacramentans are still coping with low wages and part-time work.
“Most people don’t feel very secure, nor should they,” one labor expert said.
